Wavepacket function \(\psi(x,t)=\left(\frac{\sigma}{\sigma+\frac{i\hbar t}{m}}\right)^3e^{-\frac{x^2}{2(\sigma + \frac{i\hbar t}{m})}}\) Probability distribution \(|\psi(x,t)|^2=\left(\frac{\sigma^2}{\sigma^2+\left(\frac{\hbar t}{m}\right)^2}\right)^{\frac{3}{2}}e^{-\frac{\sigma x^2}{\sigma^2+\left(\frac{\hbar t}{m}\right)^2}}\) Particle mass: m Wavepacket initial width: sigma Particle momentum: p
